messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference
messages.msgSnippet: www.greatbighappylife.com It is New Jersey. Elissa, Unschooling Momma to Emily 15, and Max 9. Proud Momma to Zack, 21. How is it that little children are so
messages.messageBody:
www.greatbighappylife.com
It is New Jersey.

Elissa, Unschooling Momma to Emily 15, and Max 9. Proud Momma to Zack, 21.
How is it that little children are so intelligent and men so stupid? It must be education that does it.
--Alexandre Dumas

----- Original Message -----
From: "Rala Brubaker" <kravmamma@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, March 19, 2009 4:22:15 PM GMT -05:00 US/Canada Eastern
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference






When is this conference and where? Would love to consider going possibly as I am also looking into the one in San Diego...thanks for the info

--- On Thu, 3/19/09, Elissa < MystikMomma@... > wrote:

From: Elissa < MystikMomma@... >
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, March 19, 2009, 7:28 AM

We've decided to go to the conference too. Can't wait to see you!

Elissa, Unschooling Momma to Emily 15, and Max 9. Proud Momma to Zack, 21.

How is it that little children are so intelligent and men so stupid? It must be education that does it.

--Alexandre Dumas

----- Original Message -----

From: "Danielle Conger" <danielle.conger@ gmail.com>

To: unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com

Sent: Tuesday, March 17, 2009 4:25:55 PM GMT -05:00 US/Canada Eastern

Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference

Well, it's official, I will be speaking at the Great Big Happy Life

Conference next month. After lots of back and forth over the past

several months, I finally figured a way to work it out with the farm and

all, but I'll only be up there for Wednesday night, not the entire

conference.

Meredith Novak will also be speaking, and I know how many of you enjoy

her posts here and at AlwaysUnschooled. Cameron Lovejoy, too, will be

talking as a grown unschooler, which should be really inspiring. It

looks to be a great line up, especially that Gatto guy. ;)

Here's a link to the talk descriptions:

http://www.greatbig happylife. com/9943. html

Hope to see several of you there!

--

~~Danielle

Emily (11), Julia (10), Sam (8)

http://www.organicl earning.blogspot .com

messages.subject: Speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Well, it s official, I will be speaking at the Great Big Happy Life Conference next month. After lots of back and forth over the past several months, I finally
messages.messageBody:
Well, it's official, I will be speaking at the Great Big Happy Life
Conference next month. After lots of back and forth over the past
several months, I finally figured a way to work it out with the farm and
all, but I'll only be up there for Wednesday night, not the entire
conference.

Meredith Novak will also be speaking, and I know how many of you enjoy
her posts here and at AlwaysUnschooled. Cameron Lovejoy, too, will be
talking as a grown unschooler, which should be really inspiring. It
looks to be a great line up, especially that Gatto guy. ;)

Here's a link to the talk descriptions:
http://www.greatbighappylife.com/9943.html

Hope to see several of you there!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (11), Julia (10), Sam (8)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com
